description: Creates a learning rate scheduler, which increases learning rate linearlyfrom 0 to given learning_rate during warmup periods and keeps learningrate a constant after that.

params.name: learning_rate
params.description: The base learning rate. It is a python float number.

params.name: warmup
params.description: If int, it means the number of steps for warmup. If float, it meansthe proportion of warmup in total training steps.

params.name: total_steps
params.description: The number of training steps. If warmup is a float number,total_steps must be provided.Defaults to None.

params.name: last_epoch
params.description: The index of last epoch. It can be set to restart training. IfNone, it means initial learning rate.Defaults to -1.
